import { useState } from "react" export default function AddDevice() { const [formData, setformData] = useState({ mac: '', type: '' }) const { mac, type } = formData function onChange(e) { setformData((prevState) => ({ ...prevState, [e.target.name]: e.target.value })) } function onSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault() let userData = { mac, type } console.log('registering device with following data:') console.log(userData) } return (

Register new device

enter the MAC addres and device type
